pages.text: kaha, "ai ibalees! tujhe kya hua ki too sajada karanevaalon mein shaamil nahin hua
usane kaha, "main aisa nahin hoon ki main us manushy ko sajada karoon jisako too ne sade hue gaare kee khanakhanaatee hue mittee se banaaya.
kaha, "achchha, too nikal ja yahaan se, kyonki tujhapar phitakaar hai
nishchay hee badale ke din tak tujh par dhikkaar hai.
usane kaha, "mere rab! phir too mujhe us din tak ke lie muhalat de, jabaki sab uthae jaenge.
kaha, "achchha, tujhe muhalat hai
us din tak ke lie jisaka samay gyaat evan niyat hai.
usane kaha, "mere rab! isalie ki toone mujhe seedhe maarg se vichalit kar diya hai, atah main bhee dharatee mein unake lie manamohakata paida karoonga aur un sabako bahakaakar rahoonga
sivaay unake jo tere chune hue bande honge.
kaha, "mujh tak pahunchane ka yahee seedha maarg hai
mere bandon par to tera kuchh zor na chalega, sivaay un bahake hue logon ko jo tere peechhe ho len
nishchay hee jahannam hee ka aise samast logon se vaada hai
usake saat dvaar hai. pratyek dvaar ke lie ek khaas hissa hoga.
nissandeh dar rakhanevaale baagon aur sroton mein honge
pravesh karo inamen nirbhayataapoorvak salaamatee ke saath
unake seenon mein jo man-mutaav hoga use ham door kar denge. ve bhaee-bhaee banakar aamane-saamane takhton par honge
unhen vahaan na to koee thakaan aur takaleef pahunchegee aur na ve vahaan se kabhee nikaale hee jaenge
mere bandon ko soochit kar do ki main atyant kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hoon
aur yah ki meree yaatana bhee atyant dukhadaayinee yaatana hai
aur unhen ibaraaheem ke atithiyon ka vrttaant sunao
